info.name: Facebook Background Generator (pink)
info.description: The background generator for my pink Appassionata Facebook theme. Choose from 8 background images, and override the theme's standard gradient background. The code is also specific enough to override most other FB themes. Preview images available at pfeifferstylez.deviantart.com. pfeiffer stylez is also on Facebook.
